title: Foolshead's Wrestling = Cretinetti Lottatore [The Corrick Collection]
other_title: Cretinetti Lottatore/Foolshead Takes Up Wrestling : Corrick Collection # 50
abstract: This is one of two original films with the character Cretinetti in the Corrick Collection, the other being 'Come Crettinetti Paga i Debiti' ('How Foolshead Pays His Debts').
description: Even in this early appearance of the Cretinetti character, the wild antics and resulting mayhem typical of his films is already evident. In this instalment, after an encounter with a strongman, Cretinetti takes to the town to exercise his newfound skills, much to the detriment of the local citizens.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002470; Presenting the Corrick Collection; Active; 2011
